Hero.title:
Crafting Digital
Experiences
Hero.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in building high-performance, beautiful web applications with Next.js and Payload CMS.

About.title: Passion for Building better web.
About.description: I'm a developer who loves blending technical challenges with creative design. My goal is to create digital products that are not only functional but also a delight to use.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.p1: I believe the best software is built at the intersection of robust engineering and thoughtful user experience. Every line of code I write is an opportunity to solve a problem effectively and elegantly.
philosophy.p2: When I'm not coding, I'm usually exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or learning about the latest advancements in web performance and security.

Projects.title: Selected Projects
Projects.fallbackDesc: Once you add projects in Payload CMS, they will appear here with your custom images and tags.

Contact.quote: "I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Let's create something amazing together!"

events.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
events.description: Leading development of scalable cloud architectures and mentoring junior developers in React and Node.js best practices.

events.title: Web Developer
events.description: Built high-performance marketing sites and complex e-commerce platforms using Next.js and headless CMS solutions.

events.title: Freelance UI Developer
